segments.text: I'm surprised by how calm everything seems at first glance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, drying a plate like it's any other day.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But then I see the water overflowing from the sink, creating a puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the boy standing on a stool, reaching for cookies in the cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the girl is there, waiting for her share, not a care in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's surprising how the woman doesn't notice any of this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the stool is about to tip over, but the kids seem unfazed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful compared to the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm surprised by how much is happening without the woman realizing it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is certainly an interesting scene to observe.
segments.speaker: PAR
